title: White windows
body:
Sabayon Linux amd64 13.08 using Xfce 4.10
Linux 3.8.13
Intel Corporation NM10/ICH7 Family High Definition Audio Controller (rev 01)
xorg-server-1.13.4-r1


Connect to any server.
After awhile, Server->Connect
The window its white and mumble doesn't respond. I have to kill mumble.

No relevant output running mumble on terminal.
Voice chat isn't affected, only mumble windows. I can speak an hear on mumble while windows are not responding.

I can't precise when this happen, but its after I'm using mumble for awhile, never on startup or little after it.
Mumble its the only program i use which has this problem.



*This ticket has been migrated from sourceforge. It is thus missing some details like original creator etc.
The original is at https://sourceforge.net/p/mumble/bugs/1020/ .
